info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 12:23AM CDT until June 06 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR WESTERN NORTON AND EASTERN DECATUR COUNTIES... At 1223 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Norcatur, or 14 miles east of Oberlin, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Lenora, Norcatur, Jennings, Clayton, New Almelo, Kanona and Reager. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
